name: Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (I)

achievements.name: Continental Explorer: Pyre Plains (I)
achievements.desc: Light up the maps of the following areas in Natlan: Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: Scaling the Scorching Sacred Mountain (I)
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in the following areas in Natlan: Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Pyre Plains (I)
achievements.desc: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following areas in Natlan: Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: Radiant As Fire
achievements.desc: Upgrade the Statues of The Seven in Natlan to their maximum level.

achievements.name: Offerings to the Night: Pyre Plains (I)
achievements.desc: Unlock all the seals on the secret spaces of the tribes in the following areas in Natlan: Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: The Fiery Hue of the Scorching Sun
achievements.desc: Raise the Tablet of Tona in the Basin of Unnumbered Flames to the maximum level.

achievements.name: Monetoo Will Guide You Home (I)
achievements.desc: Follow 8 Monetoo and complete the graffiti in the Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: Monetoo Will Guide You Home (I)
achievements.desc: Follow 16 Monetoo and complete the graffiti in the Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: Monetoo Will Guide You Home (I)
achievements.desc: Follow 32 Monetoo and complete the graffiti in the Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: Ignited Treasure Hunter (I)
achievements.desc: Open 80 chests in the Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: Ignited Treasure Hunter (I)
achievements.desc: Open 160 chests in the Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: Ignited Treasure Hunter (I)
achievements.desc: Open 320 chests in the Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: Ignited Adventurer (I)
achievements.desc: Complete 3 Open World Time Trial Challenges in the Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: Ignited Adventurer (I)
achievements.desc: Complete 6 Open World Time Trial Challenges in the Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: Ignited Adventurer (I)
achievements.desc: Complete 12 Open World Time Trial Challenges in the Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.

achievements.name: Ancestral Reminiscence
achievements.desc: Helped Titu liberate the souls of the tribe's ancestors.

achievements.name: Not All Treasure Is Silver and Gold
Gold of the Sun, Together with his Blood
achievements.desc: Obtain the token needed for the pilgrimage to the volcano in the ruins of the Sage of the Stolen Flame.
